name: Traktin
0:
”Alexa, ask Traktin Shows what's on my calendar?”
”Alexa, ask Traktin Shows which movies are trending.”
”Alexa, open Traktin Shows.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: traktin shows
des:
This skill connects to Trakt (https://trakt.tv) to get information about TV shows and movies.

* Current functionality *

Calendar - Get your shows airing today
Say: What's on my calendar?

Trending Shows
Say: Get the trending shows.

Trending Movies
Say: Get the trending movies.

More coming in future updates!

Note: You need to link your Trakt account to Alexa for this skill to function. You will be prompted to do so the first time you start the skill.
